channel.title: How to work NoIP
channel.description:
Ok I've made a No-IP account and logged in. I went to add and made my host name and i left the ip address that was in the box there (I didnt do anything to it). Then I clicked Create Host.
I went to MoparScape V3.2 / Aryon and tryed to log into the server by typeing MyHostName.no-ip.org (I wanted no-ip.org) and nothing happened. What am I doing wrong?
Also, when and if it is fixed how do i add a source to it, I tryed to runserver...but like you know it only works for my own server......not the no-ip.org server.
Please Help! Thanks ~Jimmydean1~[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 02:52:14 PM[/size][hr]Please people...I need help with this.....
Thanks ~Jimmydean1~

item.title: How to work NoIP
item.dc:creator: @Coyle Coyle
item.description:
@Coyle wrote:

also you may have to port forward if you have a router
please consult the search for tutorials on port forwarding

Read full topic

item.title: How to work NoIP
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You need to download the No-ip dynamic Update Client from the No-ip Homepage, It automatically detects your Ip so you can connect to it using the no-ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: How to work NoIP
item.dc:creator: @Jimmydean1 Jimmydean1
item.description:
@Jimmydean1 wrote:

Ok I’ve made a No-IP account and logged in. I went to add and made my host name and i left the ip address that was in the box there (I didnt do anything to it). Then I clicked Create Host.

I went to MoparScape V3.2 / Aryon and tryed to log into the server by typeing MyHostName.no-ip.org (I wanted no-ip.org) and nothing happened. What am I doing wrong?

Also, when and if it is fixed how do i add a source to it, I tryed to runserver…but like you know it only works for my own server…not the no-ip.org server.

Please Help!
Thanks
~Jimmydean1~[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 02:52:14 PM[/size][hr]Please people…I need help with this…

Thanks
~Jimmydean1~
